description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Skewers with Chargrilled Pineapple & Rice Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn Skewers with Chargrilled Pineapple & Rice Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 20 medium green prawns, peeled and deveined with tails intact
0.25 cup sweet chilli and lime dressing

recipeInstructions.text: Soak 20 small bamboo skewers in cold water for 20 minutes. Drain.
Thread prawns lengthways onto skewers with tails at tip. Place onto a plate, cover and refrigerate until required.
Remove skin and eyes from pineapple. Cut into 2cm slices and then cut each in half.
Combine rice, capsicum, red onion, mint, coriander and dressing in a large bowl. Cover and refrigerate.
Heat a BBQ hotplate on medium heat. Cook pineapple for 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden. Cook prawns on hotplate for 1-2 minutes on each side or until cooked through.
Serve prawns and pineapple with rice salad and drizzle with extra dressing.
